Body:
"""
    Create dictionary with the given set of emission lines and scaler ``sclr``
    """
img = {}
for e in elines:
    map = np.random.rand(ny, nx) * np.random.rand() * 10
    img[e] = map
map_sclr = np.ones(shape=(ny, nx), dtype=float) * np.random.rand() * 2
img['sclr'] = map_sclr
return img
